query: ALTER TABLE auto_resolve_logs ADD COLUMN alert_type VARCHAR(50), ADD COLUMN reason TEXT, ADD COLUMN metric_value DECIMAL(10,4), ADD COLUMN notification_sent BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE;
